title: Ep 148: The Bad Boy of Perfume
itunes:title: Ep 148: The Bad Boy of Perfume
itunes:subtitle: In honor of National Fragrance Day (March 21), Kilian Hennessy, founder of By Kilian perfumes, is here to talk about the history and semantics of fragrance, the challenges of making perfumed lingerie, and why tuberose is better than Cheetos. Before tha...
description:
In honor of National Fragrance Day (March 21), Kilian Hennessy, founder of By Kilian perfumes, is here to talk about the history and semantics of fragrance, the challenges of making perfumed lingerie, and why tuberose is better than Cheetos. Before that, we discuss dermarollers and dermastamps, beauty brands that crowd-source their product development, and a skincare line for men of color. 


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara
